topic.
As paragraph 43 of ESRS S1-4 is part of the topical standard on ‘own workforce’, ‘material impacts’
in that paragraph is intended to refer specifically to material impacts on own workforce.
ESRS S1-6 Characteristics of the undertaking’s employees
